skillTree.localised_description: Initially desiring simply to join his brothers in death, Helman Ghorst now travels atop a Corpse Cart driven by his Undead kin.

effects.description: Mount: The Brothers Ghorst Corpse Cart

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summoned units have specific debuffs conditions

skillTree.localised_description: Helman Ghorst knows what he should not, but knowing is not enough – he must utilise this denied knowledge.

effects.description: Research rate: +10

skillTree.localised_description: What Helman Ghorst has lost, he will reclaim – no power of this world or beyond will stop him.

skillTree.localised_description: From atop Ghorst's nightmarish chariot pulse waves of puissant energy, enervating the undead and excoriating the souls of the living.

effects.description: Effect range: +35% for "Vigour Mortis", "Unholy Lodestone" and "The Reliquary Corruption"

skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

effects.description: Speed: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Ghorst traverses the forsaken realm as he did the roads of the Empire, as a groom, before the study of necromancy consumed his every waking moment.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10%
